about_the_game:
Embark on a charming journey with "W.O.T.E - Waking on the Endtimes," an action-adventure game with simple and captivating visuals that tells a story rich in values. Developed for all ages, especially for children, W.O.T.E promises fun, challenges, and valuable lessons in a vibrant and colorful world.

A game that talks about God to the player!

Norah is a brave young man in a world threatened by strange creatures. In each stage, he must face challenges, uncover secrets, open doors with hidden keys, find collectibles, and complete small side quests. Along the journey, he will meet charismatic characters who will enrich the story and become part of his mission to restore peace.

With simple and intuitive gameplay, you control Norah in third person, executing sequences of melee attacks with a baseball bat, and finding stones to perform ranged attacks by throwing them at various types of enemies.

Explore small open worlds (sandbox), each with its own unique and enchanting setting, ranging from green areas with grass and rocks to a city with urban buildings, passing through a labyrinth full of traps and snowy and icy locations, each bringing its own secrets and challenges.

Available in Portuguese (BR) and English, allowing players from around the world to enjoy the adventure.
